name: member-rewards
description: A sample app for managing member rewards

scripts.start:dev: npm run setup:dev && DEBUG=* node server.js
scripts.start:prod: mkdir -p logs && NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=* node server.js >> logs/$(date +%Y-%m-%d).log 2>&1
scripts.db:create:dev: npm run db:drop:dev && createuser member_rewards_dev && createdb member_rewards
scripts.setup:dev: npm install && knex migrate:rollback && knex migrate:latest && knex seed:run
